attributes.action: Sack all of the dishonorable MP's, and that means all of them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears that our current bunch of political misfits are not to be trusted. Whilst they are part and parcel of the current credit crunch with Gordon brown spending and borrowing more than the country can afford we the gullible bill payers are tightening our belts but the dishonorable members of all political parties are still abusing the system.
It is time that the public were consulted. I had to buy sink plugs, carpets and beds out of my meagre salary.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
